quote: I had also never realized before that I loved him, but I did. And his pain was my pain, and it hurt, but it also felt good in a strange way, knowing that we could share in it together.
quote_letters: I HAD ALSO NEVER REALIZED BEFORE THAT I LOVED HIM BUT I DID AND HIS PAIN WAS MY PAIN AND IT HURT BUT IT ALSO FELT GOOD IN A STRANGE WAY KNOWING THAT WE COULD SHARE IN IT TOGETHER
